meta.description: Empower your writing with AI! Our app uses OpenAI and ChatGPT to enhance your writing, correct grammar, answer questions, write codes and more. Get accurate, efficient and high-quality results in no time.

essays.title: Essays
essays.subtitle: Craft, refine, and polish your essays in any language with our powerful writing and editing AI.

codex.title: Codex
codex.subtitle: Write, debug, and translate code effortlessly across all languages and frameworks with our advanced AI.

grammarCorrection.title: Grammar Correction
grammarCorrection.subtitle: Correct your sentences into standard English, Chinese, and more with our advanced OpenAI's ChatGPT technology.

qa.title: Questions & Answers
qa.subtitle: Get answers and explanations to your questions from simple to advanced terms using our state-of-the-art AI.

about.title: About Page
about.description: Learn more about our app and what we do.
